content:
Identifier patterns are irrefutable if the @ subpattern is irrefutable or
the subpattern is not specified.

@ehuss has a PR adding this to the reference but isn't 100% confident this is correct. Can I get a confirmation from the lang team that this is indeed correct? The PR is https://github.com/rust-lang/reference/pull/876 and the second commit is the one in question specifically.
